channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Planning Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Planning Analytics

item.title: CVE-2022-22339|2024-09-17T01:00:45.906Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 219736.
